mapper.select: select id,target_item_name as materials_name from product_oi_parameter_target_item where target_item_type_id = 1 and target_item_name != '干熄焦' and target_item_name != '湿熄焦' union all select '0000000001' as id,'干熄焦' as materials_name union all select '0000000002' as id,'湿熄焦' as materials_name

select a.`date`, max(ifnull(a.production_plan,0)) as production_plan, max(ifnull(a.production_performance,0)) as production_performance from (select a.`date`, a.production_plan, a.production_performance from product_oi_yield_analysis_date a where a.`year` = #{year} and a.`month` = #{month} and materials_name != '干熄焦' and materials_name != '湿熄焦' and a.materials_name = #{materialsName} union all select a.`date`, a.production_plan, a.production_performance from ( select year(production_date) as year,month(production_date) as month,day(production_date) as date,0 as production_plan,sum(single_hole_production) as production_performance, case when coke_type = 1 then '干熄焦' else '湿熄焦' end as materials_name from product_oi_output_performance_manual_bake group by year,month,date,coke_type ) as a where year = #{year} and month = #{month} and a.materials_name = #{materialsName} union all select a.`date`, a.production_plan, a.production_performance from (select year(production_date) as year, month(production_date) as month, day(production_date) as date, 0 as production_plan, sum(single_hole_production) as production_performance from product_oi_output_performance_manual_bake where #{materialsName} = '全焦' group by year, month,date) as a where year = #{year} and month = #{month} union all select a.`date`, a.production_plan, a.production_performance from (select a.year, a.month, a.`date`, 0 as production_plan, (a.production_performance - ifnull(b.nutCoOutput, 0) - ifnull(coFinesOutput, 0)) as production_performance from (select year(production_date) as year, month(production_date) as month, day(production_date) as date, sum(single_hole_production) as production_performance from product_oi_output_performance_manual_bake where #{materialsName} = '冶金焦' group by year, month, date) as a LEFT JOIN (select year, month, date, sum(production_performance_jd) as nutCoOutput, sum(production_performance_jf) as coFinesOutput from (select year(car_send_date) as year, month(car_send_date) as month, day(car_send_date) as date, sum(ifnull(a.complete_pound_num, 0)) as production_performance_jd, 0 as production_performance_jf from logistics_wv_trans_actual_nut a group by year, month,date union all select year(car_send_date) as year, month(car_send_date) as month, day(car_send_date) as date, 0 as production_performance_jd, sum(ifnull(a.complete_pound_num, 0)) as production_performance_jf from logistics_wv_trans_actual_fines a group by year, month,date) as a group by year, month,date) b ON a.year = b.year and a.month = b.month and a.date = b.date) as a where year = #{year} and month = #{month} ) as a group by a.`date` order by a.`date`

select a.materials_name, sum(a.production_plan) as production_plan, sum(a.production_performance) as production_performance from ( select a.target_item_name as materials_name, sum(ifnull(b.production_plan,0)) as production_plan, 0 as production_performance from product_oi_parameter_target_item a left join product_oi_yield_analysis_date b on a.id = b.materials_id where concat(`year`,'-',LPAD(`month`,2,'0'),'-',LPAD(`date`,2,'0')) >= #{startDate} and concat(`year`,'-',LPAD(`month`,2,'0'),'-',LPAD(`date`,2,'0')) <= #{endDate} and a.target_item_type_id = 1 and a.target_item_name in ('全焦','冶金焦','蒸汽') group by a.target_item_name union all select '全焦' as materials_name, 0 as production_plan, sum(ifnull(a.single_hole_production,0)) as production_performance from product_oi_output_performance_manual_bake a where a.production_date >= #{startDate} and a.production_date <= #{endDate} union all select '冶金焦' as materials_name, 0 as production_plan, (sum(production_performance) - sum(production_performance_jd) - sum(production_performance_jf)) as production_performance from ( select sum(ifnull(a.single_hole_production,0)) as production_performance, 0 as production_performance_jd, 0 as production_performance_jf from product_oi_output_performance_manual_bake a where a.production_date >= #{startDate} and a.production_date <= #{endDate} union all select 0 as production_performance, sum(ifnull(a.complete_pound_num,0)) as production_performance_jd, 0 as production_performance_jf from logistics_wv_trans_actual_nut a where a.car_send_date >= #{startDate} and a.car_send_date <= #{endDate} union all select 0 as production_performance, 0 as production_performance_jd, sum(ifnull(a.complete_pound_num,0)) as production_performance_jf from logistics_wv_trans_actual_fines a where a.car_send_date >= #{startDate} and a.car_send_date <= #{endDate} ) as a union all select '蒸汽' as materials_name, 0 as production_plan, 0 as production_performance ) as a group by a.materials_name

select sum(a.power_plan) as power_plan,sum(a.power_performance) as power_performance from ( select sum(a.plan_value) as power_plan, 0 as power_performance from energy_ee_day_plan_output a where planyear_month_day >= #{startDate} and planyear_month_day <= #{endDate} union all select 0 as power_plan, sum(a.yield) as power_performance from product_oi_power_generation_performance a where 1 = 1 and (#{startDate} = '' or a.stat_time >= case when #{startDate} = '' then null else concat(#{startDate}, ' 00:00:00') end) and (#{endDate} = '' or a.stat_time <= case when #{endDate} = '' then null else concat(#{endDate}, ' 23:59:59') end) ) as a

select a.turbine_no, sum(a.yield) as yield, sum(a.steam) as steam from product_oi_power_generation_performance a where 1 = 1 and (#{startDate} = '' or a.stat_time >= case when #{startDate} = '' then null else concat(#{startDate}, ' 00:00:00') end) and (#{endDate} = '' or a.stat_time <= case when #{endDate} = '' then null else concat(#{endDate}, ' 23:59:59') end) group by a.turbine_no order by a.turbine_no

select max(full_coke_rate) as full_coke_rate, max(coke_dry_quenching_rate) as coke_dry_quenching_rate, max(steam_rate) as steam_rate, max(coal_consumption_per_ton) as coal_consumption_per_ton, max(electric_consumption_per_ton) as electric_consumption_per_ton from ( select case when sum(Loading_coal) = 0 then 0 else round(sum(single_hole_production) / sum(Loading_coal) * 100, 2) end as full_coke_rate, 0 as coke_dry_quenching_rate, 0 as steam_rate, 0 as coal_consumption_per_ton, 0 as electric_consumption_per_ton from product_oi_output_performance where 1 = 1 and (#{startDate} = '' or production_date >= case when #{startDate} = '' then null else concat(#{startDate}, ' 00:00:00') end) and (#{endDate} = '' or production_date <= case when #{endDate} = '' then null else concat(#{endDate}, ' 23:59:59') end) union all select 0 as full_coke_rate, case when sum(material_weight) = 0 then 0 else round(sum(case when material_code = '12345678' then material_weight else 0 end) / sum(material_weight) * 100, 2) end as coke_dry_quenching_rate, 0 as steam_rate, 0 as coal_consumption_per_ton, 0 as electric_consumption_per_ton from product_oi_coke_records where 1 = 1 and (#{startDate} = '' or class_start_time >= case when #{startDate} = '' then null else concat(#{startDate}, ' 00:00:00') end) and (#{endDate} = '' or class_start_time <= case when #{endDate} = '' then null else concat(#{endDate}, ' 23:59:59') end) union all select 0 as full_coke_rate, 0 as coke_dry_quenching_rate, case when b.coke_yield = 0 or isnull(b.coke_yield) then 0 else round(a.steam_yield / b.coke_yield * 100, 2) end as steam_rate, 0 as coal_consumption_per_ton, 0 as electric_consumption_per_ton from ( select sum(yield) as steam_yield from product_oi_steam_performance where 1 = 1 and (#{startDate} = '' or stat_time >= case when #{startDate} = '' then null else concat(#{startDate}, ' 00:00:00') end) and (#{endDate} = '' or stat_time <= case when #{endDate} = '' then null else concat(#{endDate}, ' 23:59:59') end) ) a, ( select sum(single_hole_production) as coke_yield from product_oi_output_performance where 1 = 1 and (#{startDate} = '' or production_date >= case when #{startDate} = '' then null else concat(#{startDate}, ' 00:00:00') end) and (#{endDate} = '' or production_date <= case when #{endDate} = '' then null else concat(#{endDate}, ' 23:59:59') end) ) b union all select 0 as full_coke_rate, 0 as coke_dry_quenching_rate, 0 as steam_rate, case when sum(single_hole_production) = 0 then 0 else round(sum(Loading_coal) / sum(single_hole_production) * 100, 2) end as coal_consumption_per_ton, 0 as electric_consumption_per_ton from product_oi_output_performance where 1 = 1 and (#{startDate} = '' or production_date >= case when #{startDate} = '' then null else concat(#{startDate}, ' 00:00:00') end) and (#{endDate} = '' or production_date <= case when #{endDate} = '' then null else concat(#{endDate}, ' 23:59:59') end) ) as a
